name: Classic Fit
description:
This is a pair of women's Classic Fit pants made by Charter Club in a size 10. 
 The pants are black and feature two front slash pockets, a zip-up, hook and loop, and button front closure, and two back button-up pockets.  
 They measure approximately 16 across the waist with a 27 inseam and a 29.5 inseam, and 9.5 rise when laid flat. 
 These pants were made in Vietnam and are made of a 97/3 cotton/spandex blend for the body and an 83/17 nylon/spandex blend for the panel. 
 The garment comes in good pre-owned condition.
